jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Mobility Marketplace is the team that manages, improves, and owns Gojek's liquidity across the marketplace (2W & 4W). We are a specialized team tasked with balancing across customers, drivers, and Gojek objectives. It's ranging from pricing, driver incentives, demand generation, and the core allocation which is match-making between customers and drivers

Gojek is seeking a talented, strategically focused analytics leader to drive business insights, deliver business functions-facing solutions, build a data-driven decision-making environment as well in charge of data architecture for Gojek Mobility Marketplace Business and Products team.
jobsJson.description:
Mobility Marketplace is the team that manages, improves, and owns Gojek's liquidity across the marketplace (2W & 4W). We are a specialized team tasked with balancing across customers, drivers, and Gojek objectives. It's ranging from pricing, driver incentives, demand generation, and the core allocation which is match-making between customers and drivers

Gojek is seeking a talented, strategically focused analytics leader to drive business insights, deliver business functions-facing solutions, build a data-driven decision-making environment as well in charge of data architecture for Gojek Mobility Marketplace Business and Products team.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Identify and translate opportunities into actionable recommendations to achieve Mobility Marketplace Product Group and company OKRs
  • Perform analytic deep dives to drive business insights and influence strategic decisions
  • Establish relevant reporting for the group, perform necessary ad-hoc analysis as required to support strategy and analyze performance of feature changes/ experimentation
  • Build and maintain data foundation relevant for business users
  • Proactively identify actions to capture value i.e: driver/ customer segmentation, retention method, product success metrics
  • Directly lead a team of approximately 7+ people while exerting leadership and influence across functions and around 20+ stakeholders

• Minimum 3-5 years of experience in Business Intelligence and/or Analytics, with experience of taking on roles with increasing responsibility, and minimum of 3 years of management/ leadership experience
  • Strong geolocation analysis capability, basic statistics and Machine Learning (forecasting, clustering, and statistical significance test)
  • Strong business sense, data-driven, and experienced in stakeholder management
  • Expert in SQL
  • Strong experience with a data visualization and dashboarding tool (e.g. Tableau, Metabase, etc.)
  • Fluent in Python or R is a plus. Good knowledge of Pentaho/Shell Scripting/other ETL tools is good as well
  • Excellent communication and leadership, goal-oriented, and good ability to work in a team, creative thinking, and collaborative
  • Knowledge of BI best practices/methodologies
